channel.title: [508] Client Crash
channel.description:
Can anyone tell why this error occured and what it means? I got it when I tried to face the NPC to the player. It works in the NPCvsPlayer Combat class but when used in the NPC class it crashes the client.
[code] Error: Class72:59 PacketParser:1266 Class14:33 Class90:143 client:786 Applet_Sub 1:478 Applet_Sub1:151 java.lang.Thread.run | java.lang.RuntimeException: gnp1 po s:36 psize:6 | T2 - 222,216,179 - 6,3172,3427 - 8,1,52,16,-128,1, [/code]

item.title: [508] Client Crash
item.dc:creator: @Berky-Scape Berky-Scape
item.description:
@Berky-Scape wrote:

Can anyone tell why this error occured and what it means? I got it when I tried to face the NPC to the player. It works in the NPCvsPlayer Combat class but when used in the NPC class it crashes the client.

Error: Class72:59 PacketParser:1266 Class14:33 Class90:143 client:786 Applet_Sub
1:478 Applet_Sub1:151 java.lang.Thread.run | java.lang.RuntimeException: gnp1 po
s:36 psize:6 | T2 - 222,216,179 - 6,3172,3427 - 8,1,52,16,-128,1,
